name: Silver Package
descriptions: Serve Beverages such as: Coke, Sprite, Waters, etc.
Serve Straight shots/chilled shots dressed with salt/tajin.
Serve Mixed Drinks such as: Crown and Sprite, Buchanan and Pineapple, Tequila and soda, etc.

name: Reposado Package
descriptions: Serve Beer choice of dressed with salt/tajin or choice of michelada setup.
Serve Beverages such as: Coke, Sprite, Waters, etc.
Serve Straight shots/chilled shots dressed with salt/tajin.
Serve Mixed Drinks such as: Crown and Sprite, Buchanan and Pineapple, Tequila and soda, etc.
Serve Three Mixed shots of your choice such as: Green teas, White teas, Vegas Bombs, Mexican candy’s, lemon drops, etc.
Serve One cocktail made with fresh lime juice of your choice: Palomas, Pineapple Margaritas, Strawberry/Mango Margaritas, etc.

name: Añejo Package
descriptions: Serve Beer choice of michelada setup or can get beer dressed with salt.
Serve Beverages such as: Coke, Sprite, Waters, etc.
Serve Straight shots/chilled shots dressed with salt/tajin.
Serve Mixed Drinks such as: Crown and Sprite, Buchanan and Pineapple, Tequila and soda, etc.
Serve Four Mixed shots your choice of preference such as: Green teas, White teas, Vegas Bombs, Mexican candy’s, lemon drops, etc.

Serve Three Cocktails made with fresh lime juice your choice of preference: Ranch Waters, Grapefruit or Watermelon Palomas, Pineapple margaritas, strawberry or mango margaritas, classic lime margaritas, flavored lemon drop drinks, old fashion, whiskey sour, etc.
